name: Switch Off The Light
description:
STORY

Switch Off The Light is a 2D racing game. The player controls Sunny, a cursed cat separated from his shadow and transposed in a strange world. Sunny and his shadow have to help each other to overcome obstacles on their ways.

FEATURES

Players has the possibility to change between two worlds where the two cats are trapped. By using reflex and rapidity, players has to switch depends on obstacles and cat’s abilities.

 

CONTEXT OF CREATION

This is a student project created in three weeks. The subject was to make a prototype with Unity 2D for smartphones. The aim is to be able to present it and convince potential investors (as part of the simulation). 

 

TEAM ( from e-artsup Lille, France) : 

- Alexia RUILLET : 2D Graphics / Creative Direction

- Dorian MESTDAGH : Programming / Integration

- Samuel COTIN : Level Design / Sound Design
